attributes.action: get David Beckham back into the England team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Beckham should be back into the England team, they have not won since he played for them and was a tremendous captain. He increases moral in the team and you can see that he has passion for his country when he plays, he has alos been one of the biggest influences for young people to get into sport for a long time. Steve McLaren made a mistake and does not want to admit this!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
